attributes.additional_details: This e-petition has been set up to collect enough signatures to force yet another attempt at getting the UK electorate the promised fair and democratic vote on leaving the EU. If Brussels has taught us anything it has taught us never to accept a no for an answer. After the inevitable and "undemocratic" no result that we will get from our political elite on the 27 October 2011 I think it only fair that we should keep pursuing this course of action until we get the yes vote that we want.
